author: adosiawolf
title: P2P Manufacturing with Adosia IoT
description: Manufacturing is centralized demanding massive shipping overhead which has a negative impact on the environment.
solution: Deploy open p2p marketplace to enable new economic opportunity for monetizing 3d designs and executing decentralized print job fulfillments
experience: Adosia has grown to over 15 regular team members, ranging from sophisticated Cardano developers to senior design engineers from spacex.
